TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplatePagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示使你可以创建自定义分页 UI 的 字段。

span.span: Represents a field that enables you to create a custom paging UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 对象可显示导航控件，这些控件使用户能够逐页浏览由实现该接口的控件所显示的数据 。Use the object to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data that is displayed by a control that implements the interface. (是 控件。 ) 你还可以使用 对象来显示有关基础数据源的信息，如记录总数和当前页码。(An example is the control.) You can also use the object to display information about the underlying data source, such as total number of records and the current page number. 该 字段没有内置布局。The field has no built-in layout. 因此，必须在模板中显式创建布局 。Therefore, you must explicitly create the layout in the template. 可以通过使用级联样式表 (CSS) 类或内联样式元素来设置内容的格式。You can format the content by using cascading style sheets (CSS) classes or inline style elements. 可以 通过使用属性来引用包含对象的控件 `Container` 。You can reference the control that contains the object by using the `Container` property. 当您想要创建绑定表达式来显示检索到的记录数、总页数和类似信息时，这非常有用。This is useful when you want to create binding expressions to show how many records were retrieved, the total number of pages, and similar information. 这些绑定表达式可以使用控件的属性 ，例如、、 和 。These binding expressions can use properties of the control such as , , , and . 字段提供 事件，此事件通常用于在单击模板中的按钮时执行任务 。The field provides the event, which is typically used to perform a task when a button in the template is clicked. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在控件中添加字段 。The following example shows how to add a field in a control. 此示例使用 来显示当前页码、总页数和总记录数。This example uses the to display the current page number, the total number of pages, and the total number of records. 此 控件还包含两个 字段和一个 字段，用于显示使用户能够分页浏览数据的导航控件。The control also contains two fields and a field to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/CS/TemplatePagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/VB/TemplatePagerFieldVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件来执行不同的操作，具体取决于在字段中单击的按钮 。The following example shows how to use the event to perform a different action depending on which button was clicked in a field. 此示例使用 显示允许用户逐页浏览数据的导航控件。This example uses the to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/CS/OnPagerCommandCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/VB/OnPagerCommandVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数通常用于将字段动态添加到 控件。This constructor is typically used to dynamically add fields to a control. 若要将 对象动态添加到 控件，请创建新的 对象。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object. 设置其属性，向其中添加控件，然后将其添加到控件的字段集合 。Set its properties, add controls to it, and then add it to the field collection for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法。The method is a helper method. 方法使用此方法将 当前对象的属性复制 到 在参数中传递的对象 `newField` 。It is used by the method to copy the properties of the current object to the object that is passed in the `newField` parameter. ## Examples [ListView Web 服务器控件概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398790(v=vs.100))[ListView Web Server Control Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398790(v=vs.100))

summary.span: 处理 对象中发生的事件并执行适当的操作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the object and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法。The method is a helper method. 当单击控件中的按钮时，方法使用它来处理在对象中发生的事件 。It is used by the method to handle events that occur in the object when a button inside the control is clicked. 方法调用 方法并检查 属性。The method invokes the method and examines the property. 如果 已更改，则此方法 将调用方法来更新控件的页属性 。If has changed, this method invokes the method to update the page properties of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnPagerCommand (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs e);

abstract member OnPagerCommand : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs -> unit override this.OnPagerCommand : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击对象中的按钮时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when a button is clicked in the object. 这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

exception.span: 没有 事件的处理程序。

span.span: There is no handler for the event.

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写时，调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ListView Web Server Control

summary.span: 当单击 对象中的按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a button is clicked in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击对象中的按钮时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when a button is clicked in a object. 这使您可以在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件来执行不同的操作，具体取决于在对象中单击的按钮 。The following example shows how to use the event to perform a different action depending on which button was clicked in a object. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的页导航字段的自定义内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the pager field in a control.

value.span: 一个模板对象，它包含 控件中的页导航字段的自定义内容。

span.span: A template object that contains the custom content for the pager field in a control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可定义自定义用户界面 (UI) 用于对数据进行分页。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for paging data. 此 模板通常包含用于逐页浏览数据的导航控件。The template usually contains navigation controls to page through data. 它还可用于显示有关基础数据源的信息，如记录总数或当前页码。It can also be used to display information about the underlying data source, such as the total number of records or the current page number. 若要以声明方式创建自定义模板，请将 `PagerTemplate` 元素放在 对象内。To create a custom template declaratively, put a `PagerTemplate` element inside the object. 然后，可以将内容添加到 `PagerTemplate` 元素。You can then add the contents to the `PagerTemplate` element. 通过使用属性，可以在模板中引用绑定表达式中的控件 `Container` 。You can reference the control in binding expressions in the template by using the `Container` property. 此属性用于访问控件的属性 ，其中包括 、 和 属性。This property provides access to the properties of the control, which includes the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将控件添加到 访问控件属性的模板 。The following example shows how to add controls to the template that access properties of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/CS/TemplatePagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/VB/TemplatePagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]
